body.p: The Silverpeas Collaborative Platform can be freely downloaded and deployed into your organization. Because it is a professional business class product, you can need some helps, accompaniments or have asks about the way to install, to use or to adapt it to your requirements. The Silverpeas team provides several ways of support, from a simple mailing-list to a business active support.

section.name: Mailing-lists
section.p: If you don't have subscribed to any business support, and you have some questions, you can join us at the mailing-list below. They are hosted in the Google Groups, then a Google account is required to post messages.

ul.li: The Silverpeas user list for questions about the installation and the use of Silverpeas,
The Silverpeas development list for questions or information on the development of Silverpeas. This mailing-list is more dedicated to both contributors and integrators.

section.name: Issue tracking
section.p: We provide a web tool to track issues from our all users, customers and contributors. You can help us to improve the Silverpeas Collaborative Platform by submitting bug reports or by asking for new features.
The feature asks are only treated within a business approach.
Our issue tracking system is available at Silverpeas Redmine

section.name: Business Support
section.p: If you whish to be accompanied in your use of the Silverpeas Collaborative Platform or if you need some additional features or an adaptation of some of them to your requirements, we provides you with different levels of business supports. Theses offers are casted by our commercial entity which provides also some SaaS offers (SilverCloud).
Please consult our commercial site at http://www.silverpeas.com/
